# Hello, Quarto + tidyverse ðŸ‘‹

This starter site is generated with **Quarto** and uses **tidyverse**-compliant packages.

## Quick example

```{r}
#| label: load-pkgs
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
#| label: summarize
penguins_clean <-
  penguins |>
  clean_names() |>
  drop_na(bill_length_mm, flipper_length_mm, species, island)

penguins_clean |>
  group_by(species, island) |>
  summarize(
    n = n(),
    mean_bill = mean(bill_length_mm),
    mean_flipper = mean(flipper_length_mm),
    .groups = "drop"
  ) |>
  arrange(species, island)


```

```{r}
#| label: plot
#| fig-cap: "Bill length vs flipper length by species"
penguins_clean |>
  ggplot(aes(bill_length_mm, flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7) +
  facet_wrap(~ species) +
  labs(x = "Bill length (mm)", y = "Flipper length (mm)")


```
